EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Cloud Cost Compare!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name:default=}}, Welcome to Turbonomic Cloud Cost Compare! Your account has been successfully created. Here are some tips to get the best performance and cost for your app:
- Define your application with manual entry (hint auto-discovery is coming soon)
- Give your app a name, enter the number of VMs, pick the OS and a few more metrics
- Hit submit
- We’ll provide you with the results - You can share those results or start a new comparison
It’s a multi-cloud world and we’ve got you covered! -The Turbonomic Team
